targets.rawSql:
SELECT a.codigo::Text "CODIGO CASO", 
     		e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
			e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
			f.nombre::Text "CATEGORIA", g.nombre::Text "SUBCATEG",case when m.nombre is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.nombre end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
      case when n.nombre is null then 'SIN CATEG 5TO NIVEL' else n.nombre end::Text "CATEG ADI",
	   case when nv.nombre is null then 'SIN CATEG DE 5TO NIVEL' else nv.nombre end::Text "CATEG 5TO NIVEL",
			i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
			to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY')::Text "FECHA CREACION",
			to_char(h.fecha_registro, 'dd-mm-YY')::Text "FECHA INCIDENCIA",
      case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
      case when v.name is null then 'Analizando' else (v.name || ' ' || v.last_name ) end::Text "RESPONSABLE",
			v.phone::Text "TELF. RESP"
      FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
			-- inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula usuario ubch
            inner join gestion.categoria f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.sub_categoria g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN gestion.historico h ON h.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON h.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = h.id_caso and j.principal = true
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  public.user_detail v ON w.id = v.user_id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.extra_categoria m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.adicional_categoria n ON n.id = a.id_adicional_categoria
			LEFT JOIN  gestion.categoria_n_v nv ON nv.id = a.id_categoria_n_v
            where h.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) 
			and h.active = 1 
			and a.id_categoria in (4)

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS
LISTADO DE CASOS  DE DESASTRES NATURALES EN LA BASE DE DATOS

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    where a.id_categoria in (4)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    where a.id_categoria in (4)
    and a.id_estatus in (5)

-- Casos Recibidos
 SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    where a.id_categoria in (4)
    and a.id_origen = 2

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    where a.id_categoria in (4)
    and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
where a.id_categoria in (4) 
and a.id_estatus in (1,2)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
where a.id_categoria in (4) 
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
where a.id_categoria in (4)
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and a.verificado is null 
and (a.feedback < 3 or a.feedback is null)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
where a.id_categoria in (4)
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
											   FROM gestion.caso a
											   where a.id_categoria in (4)
											   and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
	FROM gestion.caso a
	where a.id_categoria in (4) 
  and a.id_estatus in (6)
	and (a.feedback >= 3 or a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT m.name as categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
           inner join gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria               
           where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_categoria in (4) 
           GROUP BY categoria
           ORDER BY total desc LIMIT 5;

SELECT m.name as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
               	inner JOIN gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria               
            where a.id_estatus in (6) and a.id_categoria in (4)
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

--Total de Casos por Fecha
select  to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YYYY') as fecham, to_char(a.fecha, 'YYYY-mm-dd') as fechao,
	  count(a.fecha) as total
    from gestion.caso a
	  where  a.fecha > CAST(now()::timestamp AS DATE) - CAST('15 days' AS INTERVAL)  
	  and	a.id_categoria in (4) and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
        group by fecham, fechao
        order by fechao

panels.title: HISTÓRICO DE CASOS RECIBIDO EN EL SISTEMA DESDE LA VENAPP (ÚLTIMOS DÍAS)
REPORTE GENERAL DE LOS CASOS DE DESASTRES NATURALES

targets.rawSql:
SELECT m.name as categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
			     inner JOIN gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
           where a.id_categoria in (4) 
           and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) 
			   GROUP BY categoria ORDER BY total desc;

SELECT m.name as categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
			     inner JOIN gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_adicional_categoria
           where a.id_categoria in (4) 
           and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) 
			   GROUP BY categoria ORDER BY total desc;

panels.title: REPORTE GENERAL DETALLADO POR LAS CATEGORIAS DESASTRES NATURALES

targets.rawSql:
SELECT i.nombre as estatus, count(a.id) as subtotal,
            (SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
    				 inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
    				 inner join gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
    			 	 where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_categoria in (4) and e.ubch = 1)::Text "Total"
      FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
	          where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_categoria = 3 and e.ubch = 1 group by estatus

SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
					inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			 		where a.id_estatus in (1,2) 
					and a.id_categoria in (4) and e.ubch = 1

SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
					inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			 		where a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) 
					and a.id_categoria in (4) and e.ubch = 1

SELECT count(a.id) FROM gestion.caso a
					inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
					inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id
			 		where a.id_estatus in (6) 
					and a.id_categoria in (4) and e.ubch = 1

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

SELECT m.name as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
           inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
           inner JOIN gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_sub_categoria               
           where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and a.id_categoria in (4) and e.ubch = 1
           GROUP BY sub_categoria
           ORDER BY total desc;

SELECT m.name as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
           inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
           inner JOIN gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_sub_categoria               
           where a.id_estatus in (6) and a.id_categoria in (4) and e.ubch = 1
           GROUP BY sub_categoria
          ORDER BY total desc;

--Total de Casos por Fecha
select  to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YYYY') as fecham, to_char(a.fecha, 'YYYY-mm-dd') as fechao,
	  count(a.fecha) as total
    from gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
	  where  a.fecha > CAST(now()::timestamp AS DATE) - CAST('15 days' AS INTERVAL)  and 
	  a.id_categoria in (4) and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) and e.ubch = 1
    group by fecham, fechao
    order by fechao

panels.title: HISTÓRICO DE CASOS UBCH RECIBIDO EN EL SISTEMA DESDE LA VENAPP (ÚLTIMOS DÍAS)
REPORTE GENERAL CASO DE DESASTRES NATURALES DE UBCH EN EL SISTEMA

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (a.nombre) a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO", 
      e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
			e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
			f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
            case when n.name is null then 'Sin Categ Adi' else n.name end::Text "CATEG ADI",
			i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
			to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY')::Text "FECHA CREACION",
			to_char(h.fecha_registro, 'dd-mm-YY')::Text "FECHA INCIDENCIA",
            case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
            case when w.username is null then 'Analizando' else (w.first_name || ' ' || w.last_name ) end::Text "RESPONSABLE",
			w.phone::Text "TELF. RESP"
            FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
			inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN gestion.estatus i ON a.id_estatus = i.id 
            inner JOIN gestion.historico h ON h.id_caso = a.id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id --and j.id_user is not null
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category n ON n.id = a.id_adicional_categoria
            where a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) 
            and a.id_categoria in (4) and e.ubch = 1

panels.title: LISTADO DE CASOS  DE LA BASE DE DATOS
LISTADO DE CASOS  DE DESASTRES NATURALES DE LA BASE DE DATOS (UBCH)
